name: Omni (itch) (Stove_Top)
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1!

-OMNI-

In this game you play as a young boy named Ozzie who's on a quest to defeat the evil King Avian before he can destroy reality. Collect money and other items to get stronger on the way! But be careful! If you fall in battle, King Avian will distort reality, causing the land to change,  and force you to start from a new beginning. You won't loose everything, though. The Goddess Omni is ready to save your hearts or money upon your downfall, so don't worry about loosing them! Now get out there, defeat Avian's foul army, and save reality!

-CONTROLS-

WASD to move

 Enter and Space to use items. 

-Credits-

Pixel NES font by Neale Davidson:

https://fonts2u.com/pixel-nes.font

Health Heart System by BMo:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NViMw-ALAo

Game by StoveTop:
